author: Deleted User
content: I found an issue on kiln testnet to get `sync_committee_bits` from beacon block rpc the same wrong result returned using lighthouse or lodestar beacon node. https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/issues/4149

author: parithosh
content: Genesis = min genesis time + genesis delay. Genesis delay is 86400 (1 day) so it should be correct afaik.

author: potuz
content: Oh so the genesis in the readme is not a config value. Yeah I suppose it's fine but given both Alex and me were confused by this, probably better to keep min genesis time which is a configuration value?

author: parithosh
content: Ah sure, Fair enough. In the end you just have to pass the config to the client and it understands it, afaik you don't explicitly specify the genesis time as a cli flag right?

author: ralexstokes
content: yeah i just got confused but this is the way all the software expects so lets do it this way
